scripts.test-send: npm run build && node dist/cli.js send --mailbox 0xfFAEF09B3cd11D9b20d1a19bECca54EEC2884766 -t 0xd0e3bd9fdfc791dde8aa45c6227f9310d07a9c80 -d 534351 -r https://ethereum-sepolia-rpc.publicnode.com -m "Hello, Hyperlane!"
scripts.test-search: npm run build && node dist/cli.js search --mailbox 0xfFAEF09B3cd11D9b20d1a19bECca54EEC2884766 -r https://ethereum-sepolia-rpc.publicnode.com -j test/matching.json
scripts.test-search-empty: npm run build && node dist/cli.js search --mailbox 0xfFAEF09B3cd11D9b20d1a19bECca54EEC2884766 -r https://ethereum-sepolia-rpc.publicnode.com -j test/empty.json
scripts.test-search-match2: npm run build && node dist/cli.js search --mailbox 0xfFAEF09B3cd11D9b20d1a19bECca54EEC2884766 -r https://ethereum-sepolia-rpc.publicnode.com -j test/match2.json
